DOC.brief_summary: A double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate change pain , urgency urinary frequency follow administration URG101 compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study URG101 Painful Bladder Syndrome Interstitial Cystitis
DOC.criteria: male female subject > = 18 year age moderate severe symptom PBS/IC minimum pain/urgency/frequency score female subject hormone therapy must stable dose > = 3 month positive pregnancy test pregnant lactating narcotic medical marijuana within 3 month use investigational drug device within 30 day bacterial cystitis within 30 day
